content: I cannot find the definition in http://build.fhir.org/ig/dvci/vaccine-credential-ig/branches/main/artifacts.html nor https://smarthealth.cards/
There is no formal FHIR artifact for this; it's documented in narrative only right now.
Would be great to think about including more formal artifacts in the spec (especially if this is something you're motivated to help with!)
Would such OperationDefinition be part of vaccine-credential-ig?
I think it'd make more sense outside of the specific data profiles.
@Josh Mandel I have an OperationDefinition json (for this operation) I can share as a starting point, if you'd like...
Sure, that'd be great. Keeping this in sync with the docs may be a challenge, but it'd be a start.
@Luis Maas Awesome. I added a comment for your PR
Hi @Luis Maas @Josh Mandel would you please share the operationdefinition draft with me? I'm a software engineer tasked with developing the credential for a payer.

Yes, though your link is tied to a specific git commit; https://smarthealth.cards/ has a link to https://smarthealth.cards/artifacts/operation-patient-i-health-cards-issue.json which is the "published source".

Josh Mandel said:

Yes, though your link is tied to a specific git commit; https://smarthealth.cards/ has a link to https://smarthealth.cards/artifacts/operation-patient-i-health-cards-issue.json which is the "published source".

This link no longer resolves. Is there an official link to the operation definition?
https://spec.smarthealth.cards/artifacts/operation-patient-i-health-cards-issue.json -- looks like I failed to set up a redirect for that file, will fix

Josh Mandel said:

https://spec.smarthealth.cards/artifacts/operation-patient-i-health-cards-issue.json -- looks like I failed to set up a redirect for that file, will fix

thanks
